title: Empire Builder Timetable
heading: Amtrak's Empire Builder
top_text:
Trains 7 and 27 are the same train from Chicago to Spokane; cars separate to go to Seattle and Portland.
Trains 8 and 28 join at Spokane to become the same train from Spokane to Chicago.
bottom_text:
Note:
Browning, MT (BRO) is served only in winter.
East Glacier Park, MT (GPK) is served only in summer.

Local connecting trains are provided:
at Chicago by Metra,
at Milwaukee by The Hop streetcar,
at St. Paul by Metro Transit,
at Seattle by Sound Transit,
and at Portland by TriMet MAX and Portland Streetcar.
